name: Broken Sword: The Shadow of the Templars
description: The script installs original Broken Sword game files from the GOG v2 installer
content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer.
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  game_id: sword1
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      find "$src" -maxdepth 1 -type d \( -iname scummvm -o -iname save \) -exec rm
      -r {}  \;

      find "$src" -maxdepth 1 -type f \( -iname "*.dll" -o -iname "*.ico" -o -iname
      "*.ini" \) -exec rm {}  \;'
    file: $CACHE/remove.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/remove.sh
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -I app -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/app
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/remove.sh
scummvm:
  fullscreen: true
